title: Schema-Driven Validation with Zod
description: Research on implementing schema-driven validation using Zod for type-safe data validation across the LightDom platform

content.summary: This research topic explores the implementation of schema-driven validation using Zod library to create dynamic validators from ld-schema definitions.
keyPoints: Zod provides runtime type validation for TypeScript
Dynamic schema generation from JSON schema definitions
Integration at API boundaries for request validation
Support for complex nested schemas and custom validation rules
